column2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / snum pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / spro ring ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i gtam la mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang phung po med pa la rtag tu rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / na ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / bsam @218a *//

column1: BijQA balinaH smRti balinaH boDi balinaH sarva mAra viDvaMsana balinaH sarvamAra bala pramardana balinaH sarva para pravAdinAm sahaDarmeNa nigraha balinaH sarva kleSa pramardana balinaH
column2: pa'i stobs can dang / sbyor ba'i stobs can dang / rkyen gyi stobs can dang / smon lam gyi stobs can dang / snying po med pa dang / ma 'dres shing gong du skyod par byed pa'i stobs can dang / nges par rtogs pa'i stobs can dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs can dang / thos pa'i stobs can dang / gtong ba'i stobs can dang / tshul khrims kyi stobs can dang / bzod pa'i stobs can dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs can dang / bsam gtan gyi stobs can dang / shes rab kyi stobs can dang / zhi gnas kyi stobs can dang / lhag mthong gi stobs can dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs can dang / dran pa'i stobs can dang / byang chub kyi stobs can dang snying stobs kyi stobs can dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i stobs can dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed pa'i stobs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa'i stobs can dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed pa'i stobs can sha stag ste /

column1: jQAna su vimala garjita ISvaraH aBiBUta guNa sAgara rAjA jQAna saMBava bala rAjA viraja vIra ISvara rAjA
column2: de bzhin du nyis stong lnga brgya ni 'jigs bral grags pa'i rgyal po dang / 'od zer bral dang / 'od zer bral ba'i dbyangs dang / grags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs dang / rnam grol chos grags dbyangs dang / snying po grags pa'i rgyal po dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / snang ba'i dbang phyug dang / thub chen ye shes 'bar ba'i dbang phyug dang / gnas kyi gos bsags rgyal po dang / ye shes blo gros bsam yas snying po dang / ye shes lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang / lhun po'i dpal lta bu dang / ye shes rdul bral shugs dang / ci'i dbang phyug sa bon dang / ye shes shin tu dri med sgrogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / yon tan rgya mtsho'i zil mnan rgyal po dang / ye shes 'byung ba stobs kyi rgyal po dang / byang chub rdul bral rgyal po dang / thub pa dpal brtsegs shugs kyi me tog dag /

column1: muni SrIkUwa vega saMkusumaH SrI kUwa jQAna budDiH vajra siMhaH SIla praBAsvaraH BadrottamaH ananta raSmiH siMhanandiH kpsU akzaya jQAna kUwaH ratna avaBAsaH jQAna vimalaH jQAna pravAxaH siMhakIrtiH aBijQA guNa rAjaH Darma sumanA varzI praBAkaraH aByudgatameruH Darma samudgata rAja vimalaH ganDeSvaraH vimala netraH mahA prasandayaH asaFga bala rAjA sva jQAna puNya balaH jQAna cIvaraH vaSa vartI asaFga hita IzI jQAna saMBavaH mahA meruH balagarBaH guNa AkaraH latA kusuma DvajaH gaNa praBAsaH viguNa moha rAjA vajra uttamaH DarmaketuH Goza indra rAjA svaguptaH vajraDvajaH ratneSvaraH aByudgata DvajaH SEla kalpaH rati meGaH Darma kArisAla rAjA samantagupta sAgara rAjA jQAna saMnicayaH jQAna arciH kusuma gaNiH gaja indra ISvaraH udumbara puzpaH kAQcana DvajaH Darma DvajaH vinardita rAjaH candanaH su pratizWita sTAma vikramaH Dvaja agra pradIpaH jQAna kramaH sAgaraDvajaH vyaya Darma kIrtiH mAra vinarditaH guNa arciH jQAna praBaH jQAna pradIpaH kzemarAjA jQAna GozaH Dvaja saMgrahaH kpsU vajra pradIpaH vyUha rAjA jaya saMKyA su pratizWitaH mati candrarAjA krama vinardita rAjA
column2: ye @310b shes dpal brtsegs blo dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / tshul khrims 'od gsal dang / bzang mchog dang / 'od zer mtha' yas dang / seng ge dga' dang / ye shes mi zad brtsegs dang / rin chen snang ba dang / ye shes dri med dang / ye shes rgyas pa dang / seng ge grags pa dang / mngon shes yon tan rgyal po dang / chos kyi sna ma'i me tog char 'bebs dang / 'od byed dang / lhun po mngon 'phags dang / chos yang dag 'phags rgyal po dri med dang / spos kyi dbang phyug dang / dri med spyan dang / rab tu che bsags dang / thogs med stobs spos kyi rgyal po dang / rang gi ye shes bsod nams stobs dang / ye shes chos gos dang / dbang sgyur dang / chags med pham bzhed dang / ye shes yang dag 'byung dang / lhun po chen po dang; stobs kyi snying po dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / 'khri shing me tog rgyal mtshan dang / yon tan 'od dang / gti mug rnam bral yon tan rgyal po dang / rdo rje mchog dang / chos kyi tog dang / dbyangs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / legs sbas dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen dbang phyug dang / mngon 'phags rgyal mtshan dang / ri bo lta bu dang / dga' sprin dang / chos byed dang / s'a la'i rgyal po dang / kun sbed dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang / ye shes yang dag bsags dang / ye shes 'od 'phro dang / me tog tshogs can dang / glang po @311a *//

column1: sAla indra siMha vigrahaH nArAyaNa vijita garBaH ratna guNa saMnicaryaH jyotigarBaH nakzatra viBava kIrtiH puNya bala sAla rAjA jQAna GozaH brahma uttaraH DRtarAzwraH
column2: che'i dbang po'i dbang phyug dang / au dumba ra'i me tog dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / tsandan dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / mthus gnon dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sgron ma dang / ye shes go rim dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam rgyal chos grags dang / nga rgyal sgrogs dang / yon tan 'od 'phro dang / ye shes 'od dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / bde ba'i rgyal po dang / ye shes dbyangs dang / rgyal mtshan bsdus pa dang / rdo rje'i sgron ma dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba'i grangs dang / rab tu brtan pa dang / blo gros zla ba'i rgyal po dang / rim gyis sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / s'a la'i dbang po seng ge'i sgra dang / sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po dang / yon tan rin chen yang dag bsags dang / skar ma'i snying po dang / skar ma rnam 'jig grags pa dang / bsod nams stobs s'a la'i rgyal po dang / yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang / tshangs mchog dang / yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //

column2: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sna ma'i me tog dang / ri bo'i rgyal po dang / spyan bsdams dang / tshangs mchog dang / dzambu'i grib ma dang / gang ba dang / bla ma dang / rin chen ri bo dang / rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / gtsug tor can dang / gser thub dang / thub dbang dang / koondi n+ya dang / seng ge'i rtsal dang / ye shes rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgyas sgrogs dang / gzhan gyis mi thub dang / rgyas pa dang / rgyal ba dang / phan bzhad dang / shes rab snang ba dang / dbang chen dang / zhi ba dang / @326b shes rab 'byung gnas dang / dga' ba dang / n+ya gro dha rgyal po dang / gser spyan dang / phan bcas dang / gnyi dga' dang / rin chen gtsug tor can dang / spyan bzang dang / tshangs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / tshangs pa khyu mchog dang / sgra rab dang / chos kyi zla ba dang / don mthong dang / snyan pa dang / dga' can dang / grags mchog dang / gzugs bzang dang dri zhim dang / grims g-yar dang / rab mchog spyan dang / rab spong dang / don bcas brtul zhugs dang / thugs kyi re ba bzang dang / shes rab mchog dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang / spyan mdzes dang / dag pa'i lha dang / zas gtsang dang / legs mthong lha dang / 'phags skyes rgyal mtshan dang / mig mi bzang dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / dpal 'byung dang / nga rgyal dpal dang / rdul bral dang / nor bu bzang dang / 'od zer can dang / sh'akya thub pa dang / dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang / bde 'byung ba dang / thu bo dang / yang dag 'byung dang; me tog dang / yang dag me tog dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / klus byin dang / rdo rje'i 'od dang / grags pa'i rgyal po dang / stag gi 'od zer dang / spyad bcas dang / ye shes 'byung dang / spos kyi dbang phyug dang / s'a la'i dbang po dang / sred med kyi bu'i snying po dang / skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dag @327a *// tu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to // rigs kyi bu /

column2: byams pa dang / bdag med pa dang / snying rje dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid byung pa dang / btang snyoms dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba'i sems nyid dang / @425a *// tshul khrims dang / zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sems nyid dang / brtson 'grus dang / dben pa'i sems nyid dang / bsam gtan dang / nges par sems dpa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / rgya che ba'i sems nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa'i sems dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / dad pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang / rang byung gi sems nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang / stobs dang / mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / blo rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid dang / lam dang / sgom pa'i sems nyid dang / zhi gnas dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang / rmongs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes pa bsgom pa'i sems nyid dang / sangs rgyas yid la byed pa @425b dang / mun pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / chos yid la byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang / dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i sems nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang / zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sems nyi dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / khams gsum gyi snying po len pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can thams cad la bdud tshar bcad pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad bskor ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems nyid kyi chos de la gang @426a *// rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ba'am / rab tu rtogs par bya ba phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs shing /

column2: bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang / 'chi ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bde bar bya ba dang / lo legs par bya ba dang / nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang / skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med pa cing bde bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum po dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang / bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang / 'khor mang por bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro //
